metadata.title: Free AI Endurance Workout Generator | {partner}
metadata.description: The power of AI, free for your training. Give {partner} a shot and start creating workouts that are tailored to your unique physiology and goals.

description.title: Free AI Endurance Running And Cycling Workout Generator
description.subtitle: Generate a free endurance running or cycling workout using artificial intelligence. Describe your workout in words and AI Endurance will use GPT-powered technology to generate a workout for you. You may amend the workout as many times as you'd like by describing how you'd like to change it. When you are happy with your workout, you can export it to your favorite training platform.

strength.hipWithEquipment: low-impact hip strengthening workout (with gym equipment)
strength.hipWithoutEquipment: low-impact hip strengthening workout (without gym equipment)
strength.triathlete: 30 min workout to maximize strength for triathletes

run.between: Run at a pace between {low} and {high} per {unit} for {duration}
run.noFaster: Run at a pace no faster than {high} per {unit} for {duration}

ride.between: Ride at a power between {low} and {high} for {duration}
ride.noHigher: Ride at a power no higher than {high} for {duration}
